# Tribo Skills

84 marketing skills para Claude Code e Claude Cowork - copywriting, funnels, email, SEO e mais.

## Instalação

### Claude Code (CLI)

```bash
# Adicionar o marketplace
claude plugins marketplace add https://github.com/dmend3z/tribo-skills

# Instalar todos os plugins
claude plugins install *@tribo-skills

# Ou instalar plugins específicos
claude plugins install copywriting@tribo-skills
claude plugins install sales-funnels@tribo-skills
claude plugins install email-marketing@tribo-skills
```

### Claude Desktop (Cowork)

1. **Abra o Claude Desktop** e inicie uma sessão Cowork com seu projeto

2. **Adicione o marketplace** criando/editando o arquivo `~/.claude/settings.json`:
   ```json
   {
     "permissions": {
       "allow": [],
       "deny": []
     },
     "marketplaces": [
       "https://github.com/dmend3z/tribo-skills"
     ]
   }
   ```

3. **Reinicie o Claude Desktop** para carregar o marketplace

4. **Use os skills** digitando `/` no chat para ver a lista ou invoque diretamente:
   ```
   /copywriting
   /sales-funnels
   /email-marketing
   ```

### Instalação Local (para desenvolvimento)

```bash
# Clone o repositório
git clone https://github.com/dmend3z/tribo-skills.git

# Claude Code
claude plugins marketplace add ./tribo-skills
claude plugins install *@tribo-skills
```

Para Claude Desktop, adicione o caminho local no `~/.claude/settings.json`:
```json
{
  "marketplaces": [
    "/caminho/completo/para/tribo-skills"
  ]
}
```

## Como Usar

Após a instalação, invoque os skills com `/nome-do-skill`:

```
/copywriting              → Frameworks de copywriting direto ao ponto
/sales-funnels            → Criar funis de vendas completos
/email-marketing          → Sequências de email persuasivas
/webinar-script-writing   → Scripts para webinars de alta conversão
```

No Claude Desktop (Cowork), digite `/` no chat para ver todos os skills disponíveis.

# AB SPLIT TEST ENGINEERING

## Tags
A/B TESTING, CONVERSION OPTIMIZATION, STATISTICAL ANALYSIS, CRO, DATA-DRIVEN MARKETING, JANUARY_IMPORT

## Description
This skill provides a structured approach to A/B split test engineering, enabling you to systematically improve your marketing campaigns and website performance.

**How This Skill Helps:**
- Prioritizes tests using ICE scoring to focus on highest-impact opportunities
- Calculates proper sample sizes and statistical significance thresholds
- Documents test hypotheses and isolates variables for clean results
- Analyzes conversion lift to quantify the business impact of winning variations

**When to Use:** Use when you need to optimize landing pages, email subject lines, ad creatives, or any marketing element where data-driven decisions can increase conversions.

plugins.name: social-media-advertising
plugins.description: This skill transforms Claude into a social media advertising specialist. Use it to create, manage, and optimize social media ad campaigns, develop content strategies, and analyze performance to achieve specific business goals like brand awareness, lead generation, or sales. Trigger this skill for tasks involving Facebook Ads, Instagram advertising, content calendars, and social media ROI.

plugins.name: social-media-organic
plugins.description: This skill transforms Claude into a specialist in organic social media marketing. Use it to develop strategies, create high-quality content, and build an engaged community. Trigger with keywords like 'social media strategy', 'organic marketing', or 'community building'.

plugins.name: sponsorships-partnerships
plugins.description: This skill enables Claude to act as a world-class sponsorships and partnerships specialist. It should be used when a user needs to create, manage, or optimize a partnership strategy. Trigger keywords include sponsorship, partnership, collaboration, co-branding, and influencer marketing.

plugins.name: story-driven-email-campaigns
plugins.description: This skill creates story-driven email campaigns using Andre Chaperon's Soap Opera Sequence. Use it to write compelling email sequences that build relationships and drive sales through narrative.

plugins.name: tripwire-funnel-optimization
plugins.description: This skill optimizes tripwire funnels using Todd Brown's E5 methodology to create irresistible offers, optimize pricing, and design high-converting upsell paths for maximum customer acquisition and profitability.

plugins.name: upsell-downsell-scripting
plugins.description: "This skill enables the agent to create high-converting upsell and downsell scripts based on Russell Brunson's One-Time Offer (OTO) methodology. Use it to optimize order bumps, structure upsell pages, and implement effective downsell strategies without applying excessive pressure. Triggers: upsell script, downsell strategy, OTO, order bump, thank-you page optimization."

plugins.name: vsl-script-writing
plugins.description: This skill helps users create high-converting Video Sales Letter (VSL) scripts using Russell Brunson's proven persuasion frameworks. Use this for crafting compelling sales videos for products, services, or courses.

plugins.name: webinar-script-writing
plugins.description: This skill enables the agent to create high-converting webinar scripts using the frameworks of Jason Fladlien and Jon Penberthy. It covers the entire process from introduction and content structure to offer presentation, objection handling, and closing sequences. Use this skill for webinar script creation, webinar strategy, and improving webinar performance.

plugins.name: webinars-virtual-events
plugins.description: This skill transforms Claude into a webinar marketing specialist following Jason Fladlien's One to Many selling methodology and Russell Brunson's Perfect Webinar framework. Use it for webinar scripts, presentation structure, offer presentation, objection handling, and closing techniques. Covers the Perfect Webinar, the Stack, belief-breaking content, and high-converting webinar funnels.

plugins.name: website-management
plugins.description: Manages all aspects of a website to ensure it is secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally. Use this skill for tasks related to website security, performance, SEO, and maintenance. Trigger keywords: website management, website security, website performance, SEO.

plugins.name: word-of-mouth-marketing
plugins.description: A skill for creating and executing word-of-mouth marketing strategies. Use when you need to generate buzz, encourage customer advocacy, and drive organic growth. Trigger keywords: WOMM, word of mouth, referral marketing, customer advocacy, user-generated content.

plugins.name: writing-conversion-narratives
plugins.description: Crafts persuasive sales narratives that guide customers from first click to final conversion. Use when you need to create a sales page, landing page, or other persuasive copy.
